data.title: Tait singer/songwriter
data.text:
NOW - this iconic album from 1972, available for the first time on CD - SONGFALL

This limited edition, beautifully packaged with a mini gatefold sleeve CD release, is a replica of the original vinyl package. The attention to detail is second to none. The gatefold outer sleeve is made of embossed card similar to the original, there is a facsimile of the lyric sheet, and the CD itself is a beautiful reproduction of the original vinyl disc - but in miniature. The recording has also been carefully remastered.

Moon, Blue day, Everyday, Leon, The Deserter, Country green ahead, When will I be loved?, Not really here right now, Processed, Child of Jesus, New Moon tonight and When that day comes.

Â£15 + p&p CLICK HERE to buy.
